extendedInfo.description: In His Steps is the daily Scripture reflection journal of Couples for Christ - Global Mission Foundation, Inc. FEATURES:- Daily Scripture reading from January 1 - March 31, 2013- Daily reflections and guide questions for personal reflection- Current reading will be shown based on the current date- Calendar feature to jump to a specific dayPLUS ADDITIONAL FEATURES:- Prayers and Novenas- Monthly Devotions- Bible in 1 year- List of Feasts- ROMAN MISSALand many more..REQUIREMENTS: (Important please read!!)- This application is best viewed for 7 inch and up (8",10" etc..) tablets only- Not recommended for tablets which are less than less than 7 inches (text will be too small)

reviews.title: Awesome but space for improvements
reviews.comment: Waiting for 2nd quarter to be released. Its an awesome app but  needs better functionality. Like ability to increase/decrease font size. Highlight and copy text for later referencing. At this stage just looks like a pdf, could be better if it was a fully functional app. But great none the less. Keep it up!!
reviews.author: Renato Libo-on
